properties.body:
BRAZIL-EAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V DISCOVERER TOWING
   5.4 MILE LONG CABLES:
   A. IN PROGESS IN AREA BOUND BY
      13-31S 036-48W, 13-40S 036-48W,
      13-44S 038-51W, 13-31S 036-51W.
   B. 22 THRU 24 FEB IN AREA BETWEEN
      13-35S 15-54S AND 037-23W 037-58W.
   C. 25 FEB IN AREA BETWEEN
      16-06S 13-06S AND 038-36W 038-13W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 26 FEB.
